original_title: Pitbull: Live at Rock in Rio
overview: 2012 release of Pitbull's spectacular Rock In Rio show that was recorded this past July. Live At Rock In Rio contains the entirety of the concert performed in Madrid on July 6, 2012, including live renditions of his massive hits "Hey Baby", "International Love", "Back In Time" and "Give Me Everything" among others.
title: Pitbull: Live at Rock in Rio
